## ğŸš€ Start Here
**Purpose**: Welcome new community members and provide essential onboarding information.

Your launchpad into Open Data Orbit. New to the community? Begin your journey here. Find orientation guides, community guidelines, and everything you need to get into orbit with Swedish open data.

## â“ Q&A / Helpdesk
**Purpose**: Ask questions and get help from the community.

Mission Control for all your questions. Stuck on DCAT-AP-SE metadata? Need help with GeoJSON parsing? Our community is here to guide you through data challenges, technical hurdles, and tool navigation.

## ğŸ“š Guides & Metadata
**Purpose**: Share and discuss tutorials, guides, and metadata standards.

Your navigation charts for the open data universe. Explore guides on DCAT-AP-SE, metadata best practices, data cataloging standards, and documentation. Share knowledge, improve existing guides, and chart new territories together.

## ğŸ”¬ Labs & Tools
**Purpose**: Discuss experimental tools, prototypes, and technical projects.

The innovation workshop of our data ecosystem. Test experimental tools, explore new libraries, share code snippets, and collaborate on technical projects. Where JSON meets creativity and CSV becomes art.

## ğŸŒŸ Projects & Showcases
**Purpose**: Share projects built with open data and inspire others.

The gallery of achievements in our constellation. Show off your open data applications, visualizations, and analysis projects. Inspire others with what's possible when data meets creativity. Every project is a new star in our orbit.

## ğŸ—ºï¸ Feedback & Roadmap
**Purpose**: Community input on direction, priorities, and improvements.

Shape the trajectory of Open Data Orbit. Share your ideas, vote on features, discuss community priorities, and help steer our collective mission. Your voice matters in navigating our shared future.

## ğŸ“¢ Announcements
**Purpose**: Official updates, releases, and important community news.

Updates from Mission Control. Stay informed about new features, upcoming events, important changes, and community milestones. This is where we broadcast signals across the open data cosmos.
